T=int(input())
    
for _ in range(0,T):
    n=int(input())
    wt=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    limit=list(map(int,raw_input().split()))
    wt.sort()
    limit.sort()
    count=0
    i=0
    j=0
    while(i!=n and j!=n):
        if(wt[i]<=limit[j]):
            i+=1
            j+=1
            count+=1
        else:
            j+=1
       
    print count
